nycTheatreExcerpt: Following its well-received Off Broadway run produced by Audible last year, the musical retains its wickedness, vibrancy and nerve, as well as its extraordinary ensemble of actors. It also has Arnulfo Maldonado's giant cube of a set, housing its kick-ass band, honkytonk ambiance and much of the action.
